name: This Time Around (mint_chip)
description:
A simple arcade-y game for Windows.  Collect apples while avoiding the hungry birds (they want your apples too!).  Collect the required number of apples while balancing speeding up and slowing down so that you can go around just one more time.  My entry for Summer Slow Jams July 2019.  

Controls:

  • Z: collect/speed up
  • X: jump
  • Space (hold): slow down

Credits

  • Music: Eric Skiff - Chibi Ninja - Resistor Anthems - Available at http://EricSkiff.com/music
  • Sound effects from opengameart.org
